page.title: 09Hatfield Broad Oak Health
page.content: In the village there is a doctors' surgery at Eden End occupying part of a building which was once a silk mill and then a cottage hospital. There are three doctors in the practice and the surgery reception desk is manned daily during working hours. The practice covers several other villages as well as Broad Oak and there is a subsidiary surgery of the same practice at Hatfield Heath. As there is no chemist's shop nearer than Bishop's Stortford the surgeries incorporate dispensaries. There is also a district nurse who works in the village, mainly visiting old people. The nearest hospitals are in Bishop's Stortford and Harlow, as are the nearest dental surgeons. The nearest vetinary surgery also is in Bishop's Stortford.
